content: वंशः [वमति उद्गिरति वम्-श तस्य नेत्वम् <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} A bamboo; धनुर्वंशविशुद्धोऽपि निर्गुणः किं करिष्यति <ls>H. Pr. 23</ls>; वंशभवो गुणवानपि संगविशेषेण पूज्यते पुरुषः <ls>Bv. 1. 80</ls> (where वंश has sense {2} also); <ls>Me. 79.</ls> {@--2@} A race, family, dynasty, lineage; स जातो येन जातेन याति वंशः समुन्नतिं <ls>H. 2</ls>; सूर्यप्रभवो वंशः <ls>R. 1. 2</ls> &c.; see वंशकर, वंशस्थिति &c. {@--3@} A shaft. {@--4@} A flute, pipe, reed-pipe; कूजद्भिरापादितवं शकृत्यं <ls>R. 2. 12.</ls> {@--5@} A collection, assemblage, multitude (usually of similar things); सांद्रीकृतः स्यंदनवंशचक्रैः <ls>R. 7. 39.</ls> {@--6@} A cross-beam. {@--7@} A joint (in a bamboo). {@--8@} A sort of sugar-cane. {@--9@} The back-bone. {@--10@} The Śāla tree. {@--11@} A particular measure of length (equal to ten {%hastas%}). {@--12@} The central projecting part of a sabre. {@--13@} Bamboo-manna.
